func.title: PC_Bounce

param.name: bouncyness
param.desc: Factor to multiply the new speed with. 1000 equals a factor of 1.0. Defaults to 1000.

func.desc: A particle collision function. The particle will bounce off the ground on collision. If your particles get stuck instead of bouncing, you might need to increase the CollisionVertex value a bit.
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations of the particle system.
